snippet: FIELD--Joel, 83, of White Plains, NY passed away February 10, 2016. He is survived by his wife Harriet, his son Adam; daughter Margie (Sandberg) and grandsons Aaron and Jakey (Sandberg). Joel worked as an attorney for many years. Funeral services will be held on Friday, February 12, 12:00pm at Bet Am Shalom Synagogue, 295 Soundview Ave., White Plains, NY. The family will be observing Shiva at the family residence on Sunday, Monday, and Tuesday from 2pm - 6pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FIELD--Joel, 83, of White Plains, NY passed away February 10, 2016. He is survived by his wife Harriet, his son Adam; daughter Margie (Sandberg) and grandsons Aaron and Jakey (Sandberg). Joel worked as an attorney for many years. Funeral services will be held on Friday, February 12, 12:00pm at Bet Am Shalom Synagogue, 295 Soundview Ave., White Plains, NY. The family will be observing Shiva at the family residence on Sunday, Monday, and Tuesday from 2pm - 6pm. 1/3
